sentences.english: In the beginning, they believed in Tengri Shamanism and were nomadic.
sentences.chinese: 他们最初信奉萨满教，过着游牧生活。

sentences.english: Zurvan is mentioned in the Origins of Alchemy Shamanic &Esoteric.
sentences.chinese: 祖以万在萨满教和深奥的炼金术起源中被提到。

sentences.english: The article discusses the basic information of the Daur Shamanism.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了达斡尔族萨满教的基本情况。

sentences.english: Shamanism is one of the main subjects of the Ewenki traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 萨满教信仰是鄂温克族传统文化中的主要内容之一。

sentences.english: Shamans are experts in the supernatural and can interpret dreams.
sentences.chinese: 萨满教道士是超自然的行家里手，而且能够释梦。

sentences.english: The cultures visited by the Galactic Maya were shamanic.
sentences.chinese: 这个被银河的玛雅人探访的文明是萨满教的。

sentences.english: This chapter mainly focuses on illustrating the status and influence of Manichaeism in Huihe society.
sentences.chinese: 其中重点介绍了萨满教在回纥社会的地位和影响。

sentences.english: Shamanism is the traditional and ancient religious belief of Ewenki.
sentences.chinese: 萨满教是鄂温克族传统而古老的宗教信仰。
它被称为“苍鑫式萨满教”。

sentences.english: In religious aspect, the Daur nationality believed mainly Shamanism.
sentences.chinese: 在宗教信仰方面，达斡尔族主要信仰萨满教。

sentences.english: From it we see the deep influence of Shamanism on Mongolians.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见萨满教对蒙古族影响之深。

sentences.english: Saman religion is a primitive one of the Manchu nationality and their ancestors, in which willow worship occupies an important position.
sentences.chinese: 萨满教是满族及其先民信仰的多神崇拜的原始宗教。

sentences.english: The old Shamanic beliefs of Tibet ascribed magical powers to the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 古老的萨满教把魔法的力量归功于这片土地。

pinyin: Suo3 luo2 ya4 si1 de2 jiao4

definition: sun worship/Zoroastrianism/see also 祆教[Xian1 jiao4]
pantheism, theological theory equating God with the Universe
